column5: ....Lord knows we need this....  Long Range Forecast
<object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="  Let the games begin!  G.
What the ???...you got a thing for ''wet'' Chris ?  Cripes...I've been trying to mow my lawns for about 5 days now...soon going to have to use a sythe (or is that a sickle...I forget)   :lol:

Yep get that rain the heck out of here.Been raining the last 4 days.I like the t shirt temps these days.Must be something about growing older and not likeing the cold anymore. LOL   Norm,I would make Chris come over and cut yer grass.LOL

I guess you aren't chasing whitetails this year?  It is too frigg'n hot for that.  Bring on the cold. One more day of rain should supply sufficient water for the fish.  Then, just cool, crisp autumn days are welcomed.

A huge downpour just went thru here about 30 minutes ago.  Good for the streams I spose, but bad for me.....I just found out my eavestroughs need cleaning. Oh well, I guess now I know what I'm doin this afternoon.

Well we still need more rain than that,the rivers & lakes are still at record low levels,even the creeks are really low for this time of year...i hope we get lots of rain,the forests need it too,and so do all those steelhead
As long as it stops in time for my weekend trip to Stony Lake!
Let it rain, let it rain, let it rain .. just added grass seed and I need worms
Not what I was looking forward to for the next 4 days. It was to be sunny...now they change the weather to show rain right thru to Saturday. Break out the Gortex...I'm headin North.
I dont have to walk far to my stand.LOL  November is a ways away,still lots of time to cool down.
If it doesn't stop raining here soon I'm gonna start building an ark.

I wish I could complain aout the rain here. We have barely had any, and when it does rain... its few and far between and far too little.  Let the farmers get their crops off i guess... then give me 5 inches.
